如何找到星期几

首页 分类 标签 关于
2020-03-01 | 分类 Go语言学习  | 标签 Time and date 

函数Weekday用于返回一周中的星期几。

		func (t Time) Weekday() Weekday

使用:

		weekday := time.Now().Weekday()
		fmt.Println(weekday)      // "Tuesday"
		fmt.Println(int(weekday)) // "2"

Type Weekday

time.Weekday用来描述星期 比如礼拜天 Sunday=0…

type Weekday int

		const (
			Sunday Weekday = iota
			Monday
			Tuesday
			Wednesday
			Thursday
			Friday
			Saturday
		)
